content: wua single_crochet double_crochet square it is designed for warm up america http //www warmupamerica org materials red heart super saver worsted weight 100% acrylic yarn approximately 33-35 grams 1 1 1 2 ounces & a size h 5 0 mm crochet hook gauge 13 stitches=4 measurements 7 by 9 abbreviations pattern uses us terms chain chain skip skip repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet pattern chain 22 loosely row 1 single_crochet double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook skip next chain * single_crochet double_crochet in next chain skip next chain repeat from * across row 8 times more single_crochet double_crochet in last chain 22 stitches made row 2 chain 1 turn skip 1st double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet in 1st single_crochet * skip next double_crochet * single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across row 10 times more 22 stitches made repeat row 2 until block measures 9 end off weave in ends thanks to pandastamper queene79 tinochka7 marjos honeystalks & colliegrl64 for their test crocheting skills this pattern is designed for charity specifically warm up america www warmupamerica org feel free to redistribute & use this pattern in the classroom but please keep this copyright info intact the pattern itself is not for sale please contact me at anastaciaknits@charter net / http //anastaciaknits net with any questions or to let me know what your charity group is doing please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs wua single_crochet double_crochet square designed by anastacia zittel / anastaciaknits@charter net / anastaciaknits on ravelry / http //anastaciaknits net / 11 25 12
